text: Frank Kendall III (born January 26, 1949) is an American engineer, lawyer, and executive. He was the 26th United States Secretary of the Air Force from 2021 until 2025. From 2012 to 2017 he served as the Under Secretary of Defense for Acquisition, Technology, and Logistics in the Barack Obama administration.S. HRG. 112â€“745 (112th Congress, 2012). In April 2021, President Joe Biden nominated Kendall III to be the United States Secretary of the Air Force. His nomination was confirmed by the United States Senate in July 2021. ==References== Category:1949 births Category:Living people Category:Engineers from Massachusetts Category:Lawyers from Massachusetts Category:Businesspeople from Massachusetts Category:Politicians from Massachusetts Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:United States Secretaries of the Air Force Category:People from Pittsfield, Massachusetts
title: Frank Kendall III
